name: CLP_EOB_PAID_LINE
description: This table holds the service line level secondary information for a non-primary claim.  It contains the paid amount and other secondary amounts other than claim adjustments (CAS).

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: EOB_LN_CVG_ID
columns.description: This item holds the line level coverage ID associated with American National Standards Institute secondary information that does not span multiple lines.

columns.name: EOB_LN_CLM_LN
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: EOB_LN_PAID
columns.description: This item holds the line level paid amount for American National Standards Institute secondary claims.

columns.name: EOB_LN_CONTRACT
columns.description: This item holds the line level contract amount for American National Standards Institute secondary claims.

columns.name: EOB_LN_DATE
columns.description: This item holds the line level adjudication date for American National Standards Institute secondary claims.
